name: Viking Tournament (itch)
description:
The vikings are in need of a new leader! A tournament is being held and you will try your luck! Play three different games, either with a friend or against the AI in this viking tournament.

You will be tested in:

  • Single Combat: you'll fight against a mighty oponent in spear fight. 
  • Throwing Spears: throw spears to hit your enemy. Be careful, because the obstacles change in every match.
  • Drinking Contest: like a good viking, you'll have to outmatch your drinking buddy.

Will you outstand the rest and become the new viking leader?

This game was made for the SGDJam II using Unity. Hope you enjoy it!
